attributes.action: Richard III - stick him back under the carpark.
attributes.additional_details: There have been petitions and an unholy fuss about where to bury Richard III (what's left of him).  It would have saved a lot of trouble if they had just left him where he was so I think they should put him back.  Under the car park.  And tarmac over him.

rejection.details: Only Leicester City Council can dig up the car park, not the Government.
